website_summaries.verdict: If these leg warmers fit your thighs, you'll appreciate the longer length and warm acrylic material.
pros: Unlike most leg warmers on the market today, these stretch all the way up to the top of the thigh
The long length, combined with warm acrylic material, ensures that you stay cozy throughout the winter
cons: A handful of consumers warn that these socks tend to be tight in the thigh, forcing some to roll the material down or even cut some off for a better fit

customer_reviews.title: Made to fit Slender Man
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’5”, 115 lbs, and these leggings are both too long and too tight. I’m not sure how long and thin someone’s legs need to be to fit these, but this is absurd.
customer_reviews.author: Secret

customer_reviews.title: I love that they are so long that's why I ordered ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that they are so long that's why I ordered them, but come on REALLY...As you can see in the photo I took, the thigh opening in 3 inches wide.. Even if it stretched 3 times that size - who has a 9 inch thigh?? I cut the elastic top part off just to use them. Very disappointed. Good thing they are only $11.00.
customer_reviews.author: shelliebelly

customer_reviews.title: Extra long are made for a giraffe.....
customer_reviews.text: I mean they are gonna get the job done..... but this length is rediculous. I wish I would've realized what length 48" was before I bought them. I can only get them above my knee.
customer_reviews.author: Alex fry

customer_reviews.title: Not for thick tighs
customer_reviews.text: Im 5'2 140 lbs approx 21in around where i wore the warmers in the picture. They are crazy long so they are meant to be scrunched up but its deff for people with thinner thighs so they can be worn higher on the leg. Dont mind my dog..she absolutely did not care to move. Instagram @cynnbynn Really soft, super stretchy but made too small for thick thighs.
customer_reviews.author: CynnBynn

customer_reviews.title: The length is great (I’m 5’3) but like many others who have reviewed ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews prior to ordering these. The length is great (I’m 5’3) but like many others who have reviewed this product I have muscular thighs so the top of the leg warmer cuts off my circulation if worn at the way up. Mind you i’m a size 2 and my thighs are 22.5 inch circumference at the greatest points. One size definitely does not fit all. If your thighs are at all muscular skip these and opt for a shorter length, or a different brand entirely.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony H

customer_reviews.title: Too small and not good quality material
customer_reviews.text: The review from other people who bought this is correct - Too tight! I'm already a petite person yet I find this too tight. Also, the material is not worth your $11.50. It snags! Just do yourself a favor, buy the $5 dollar leggings at Ross and make your own thigh high leggings. BTW, I was able to buy thigh high Toesox leg warmers at Marshall's for $7.99 which are way way better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Ro Yanis

customer_reviews.title: Too small for size 16/18 lady
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what I was thinking ordering these. I'm a size 16/18 in pants, and I dance a lot, mostly ballroom and some dance cardio. I really like legwarmers but there are few available for bigger gals like me. These will still be serviceable as normal legwarmers but they'll only fit my calves, not my thighs LOL. Just beware, you really do need to be a professional thin dancer in order to wear these as they are intended - on the thighs.
customer_reviews.author: ThriftyEngineer

customer_reviews.title: So love these. They are perfect length and I am ...
customer_reviews.text: So love these. They are perfect length and I am 6'2" I wear these during winter with shorts and they keep legs warm and I still have the feeling as wearing shorts. I bought some others that were too short that I thought would be long enough. These make it 6 inches past knee to where not much skin of legs show between shorts when sitting and when standing the exposed skin is hidden by my shorts. I created my own fashion with these and shorts :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice, LONG leg warmers with one drawback
customer_reviews.text: These leg warmers do indeed go all the way up your thigh and then some. However, they are stitched so tight that they are uncomfortable around your thigh if you are anything over a size 6. They may stretch a little over time like most socks and leg warmers do, so I'll have to wait and see. For the price they're well made and they're nice and soft. I'm happy otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, tight, and you can't return them!
customer_reviews.text: These did not fit in the least, barely could get them past my knees, and I am not a big girl. The size was smaller than my arm in diameter, and it didn't stretch a lot. I tried to return them, but somehow they aren't eligible for returns? I had to call and figure this out, because it's insane that a pair of socks can't be returned if they are the wrong size. I don't remember seeing that you can't return them when I ordered. I was extremely unhappy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: HaddyG

customer_reviews.title: Tight at the thigh, may be too tight for you to get up
customer_reviews.text: I really love the aesthetic of these legwarmers, but if you have normal sized female thighs (I'm a size 8-10 in Women's jeans), you are going to have a hard time pulling these all the way up without needing to tear some of the stitching. They got tight just above my knees and I had to rip some of the stitching to stretch them out enough to pull up. I guess they really are made specifically for ballerinas with little legs lol. They ended up working out alright, but I still with they were made a little wider at the top
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Pagliaro-Katz

customer_reviews.title: too small to go up thighs
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these to fit the way they are pictured, all the way up the thighs. They are long enough for that, but they are not big enough around for me to get any higher than just above my knee. I wear a size 4, and the biggest part of my thigh is 23 inches - so I don't have super large legs, the leggings are just really small at the top. The material is nice and soft, and they work great for keeping my lower legs warm, but these are not ever going to go as high as I wanted them to go. Guess I will stick to leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany A. Varney

customer_reviews.title: True to size. Not too tight.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I'm 5'2" 125lbs., muscular thighs, thicker calves, short torso/long legs. They come right up to my butt if i take the time to put them on like a pair of tights or stockings. They also scrunch well if worn just above the knee. The elastic is snug, and did leave a mark on my skin after wearing them for an hour or so, but no tighter than wearing a pair of high socks. I didn't find the elastic to be overly tight like others stated. With multiple wears they will probably stretch out a bit. I'll probably be purchasing another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Fourchette

customer_reviews.title: Non-returnable; way too tight
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to wear as thigh-high tights in winter. I am 5-5 and these are WAY too long. More importantly, the top band is so tight it would cut off circulation in my thigh if I wore it very long. I am only 101 pounds. Thank goodness these are cheap because I now learn they are non-returnable (a first for me as a Prime member and not mentioned in the ad). The same company makes a 36” tight which I’m going to try instead.
customer_reviews.author: PatentMaven

customer_reviews.title: Send wrong product and do not accepted return.
customer_reviews.text: I got a second time and when arrived, the product is not what I expected. I should have a stick as a leg because do not fit, but they do not accept return!!! To much work for a product with poor quality. Can't use. Can't return. Trash!
customer_reviews.author: Hl9

customer_reviews.title: Good if you have abnormally skinny thighs...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a petite gal, only 5'3". I'm also pretty fit. But apparently I do too many squats as I can only get these "thigh-highs" a couple inches above my knees! I'm sure these would be good for dancers or women with no quads, but they don't fit me. The material is also kind of thin, not super warm at all. Either I'll wear them like normal leg warmers or give them to my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Summary: Amazing product, just what ive been looking for. Pros: They are LONG, and fit well in my slender legs. They do not restrict at all. Cons: none. Thought: I see many people saying they are too tight but I think that, with all due respect, some products are just not for everyone. If you don't have the body type for what these are intended for, then you can bet they may be too tight. It's not right to give a bad review over something that is not the products problem.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: Item was delivered today. The material is very soft and appears to made of a stretchy material. But don't be fooled. I couldn't even get this up my calf. I'm average sized and 5'8, so it should have fit. Also, the image doesn't accurately show the hole in the back for your heel. If I would have known that, I never would have bought them, for I don't want my heels exposed. I can't even return them. One size fits all should be only small sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.text: These are just perfect and my favorites now. Excellent value, shipping and product. I WANT MORE! Will be buying more of these...from this seller. They really help keep my legs warm and stay up well without being too tight. LOVE THEM!!
customer_reviews.author: Charli

customer_reviews.title: Thighs are tighter then the feet
customer_reviews.text: The thigh part was tighter then the part that goes around your foot. Unless your feet are bigger then your thighs these won’t work for you
customer_reviews.author: Adult entertainer

customer_reviews.title: tight at the top of the thigh.  OMG
customer_reviews.text: I love how long they are because they go all the way to the top of my thigh and I am about 5'8. The problem and it is a biggie is that they are very tight at the top. So uncomfortable. It's like a rubber band around my thighs. 5 stars for length, 5 stars for comfort material, but no stars for the tight fit around my thighs.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Svalba

customer_reviews.title: Thigh high stocking alternative
customer_reviews.text: So in an attempt to create thigh high stockings, I purchased these and although they are longer than I would have liked, they are by and large the best stockings I have every owned. Even with simply a short skirt and boots, they keep you warm without getting hot. I would recommend them to any and all skirt lovers in the PNW.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Totusek

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: These legwarmers are better than I expected, being someone who usually prefers natural fibers for my clothing. The knit is soft and dense, good for keeping heat close to the body, and doesn't lose shape in consecutive wearings. While the upper elastic hits my leg at a muscular, wide point in my thigh, it has eased with wear and isn't uncomfortable- It did take a little stretching though, as it is a narrow band and was constricting initially. I am very happy with my purchase and would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my tiny thighs
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They shipped super fast and got here within a few days. They fit very snug on my tiny chicken legs so if you have bigger thighs these might be very tight but they seem like they'll stretch out a bit. Super pleased since I usually have a hard time with these being too big on my thighs and sliding down but these stay right where I put them. Will be buying these in a few more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyne

customer_reviews.title: A solid, uber-long leg warmer.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a dancer but the length of these legwarmers is terrific. I'm 5'10' and they hike up to my upper thigh. I'm slender, so the tops are not too tight on me, though I know others have complained about this. I actually wore them to climb Mt. Fuji under my waterproof trousers. They stayed put the entire way and kept me cozy. My only complaints are that they pick up lint and animal hair like a banshee, and it's super challenging to get it off/out of the weave. They also have a limited lifespan - I am on my second pair.
customer_reviews.author: smartbombsmartbomb

customer_reviews.title: Nice pair of leg warmers
customer_reviews.text: I thought the body wrappers 48 stirrup leg warmers were a good quality product. I intended to wear them to keep my legs warm while practicing and teaching Barre at the gym. They are soft and comfortable material and long enough to cover most of my leg...so it is great for when it's chilly. I love the stirrup feature which allows me to wear my ballet slipper underneath and still have support on the bottom of my foot to keep me from slipping. Overall, it is a nice product and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: star6tko

customer_reviews.title: Long and thin
customer_reviews.text: I was worried they wouldn’t be tight enough to stay up since my thighs are on the slimmer side, but they were! I’m barely 5’3” and they were very long, though. I’m making them work, and so far they’ve kept my legs warm while wearing a dress or skirt, and walking downtown from my parking lot to my office, and back.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: I was very excited to get these leg warmers, ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get these leg warmers, I ordered a set for my coworker and myself, both of us are around a size 10-12. I could hardly get these up my legs, they do not stretch well at all, they created a "muffin top" just barely passing over my knees. I suspect that the only legs they will fit well, is girls or woman who are sizes 0-2. First time that I will be returning item on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm tall so I love how long these are
customer_reviews.text: I'm tall so I love how long these are. Also, I can do a lot adjusting the height depending on what I'm doing. It's true that the tops are tight on the thighs like the other reviews say, tho I think that's a good thing because when they break in they will break in especially for your body type. My thighs are thick, however if someone identifies will having a larger body type then the elastic might be uncomfortable at first and/or might not work at all. Something to consider, tho no matter what size you perceive yourself to be it's worth a try :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extra long
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing this review, because I did see alot of bad reviews for these...but if you're like me and you liked the American Apparel socks of this length, then you would like the length of these. I'm 5'8 with long legs, and they are the length of my whole leg, which I like. I have very thin legs, but I feel like these have so much give to them and would fit alot of people. But yes, straight from the package, they look like they would be ridiculously thin, until you pull them on. I like to wear them to bed, or under pants, because I'm always so cold. I ordered 3 more pairs. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic - sized to fit a dancer’s legs at full length
customer_reviews.text: These are true dancers leggings. Well made, very long, and sized to fit a dancer’s legs and not fall down. I am 5’6”, 120 lbs and my thighs are 21 inches at the widest part. I can JUST get away with wearing these all the way up my legs - if your thighs are any bigger than this, you will need to pull them just up to your lower thigh and scrunch them at the bottom, which works and is super cute. They are extremely warm. LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: Georgiana

customer_reviews.title: Too tight, didn’t go all the way to the top of my thigh.
customer_reviews.text: The did not go past the middle of my thigh. When on the middle of my thigh, it was quite tight. Uncomfortable to dance in. They do provide warmth for what it covers, but they aren’t a thick material. Perhaps this is best for those who have leaner or smaller quad/hamstring muscles & small on the meaty/thick size. For reference, I wear a size 6 in jeans. My quads/hams aren’t that big or toned either. As far as thickness, I’d consider myself a 3-ish on a scale of 1-5.
customer_reviews.author: A.J.P

customer_reviews.title: Wish these fit better.  They are nice, cozy material.
customer_reviews.text: I read other reviews, and given my height and weight, I thought they would fit very well. But they are very tight on the thigh, and give my thighs an unattractive bulge. They are cozy, but they don't fit me very well. Also, I'm kind of bummed Amazon describes them "as one size" then upon order, the description in the invoice says extra long leg warmers. These took a long time to get here, since USPS lost them somewhere in Ohio, but they are very tight around thigh, and loose around my calves. I'll try them on once more, but I may end up returning them :(
customer_reviews.author: Monica Martek

customer_reviews.title: decent thigh highs
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as thigh highs since finding actual thigh high socks for women with thick thighs is nearly impossible. These are very warm and comfortable, but I had to cut the tops of them off otherwise they would not fit past my calves. They lasted me a few weeks before unraveling when I washed them. If you buy these I would advise hand-washing them instead of throwing them in the machine like I did. I would probably buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: I love how long these are
customer_reviews.text: I love how long these are. With a 33" inseam, most "extra long" leg warmers come up short on me unless I wear them un-scrunched and halfway up my calf. I have a small frame but heavier around thighs and rear, and these are stretchy enough to fit comfortably around my thighs. I wear them around my house to stay warm, and have had no issues at all, even after washing they keep their length and hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: ohyouknow

customer_reviews.title: Love the length and the material is fine but they ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the length and the material is fine but they are so tight that I could not lift them up my thigh and my legs are very skinny. I ended up cutting them...defeats the purpose of buying extra long stirrups. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn from Connecticut

customer_reviews.title: tighter than hell, cuts off blood supply.
customer_reviews.text: these are outrageously small. Most of the material is fine, but the top is insanely tight. it chokes my CALVES...and I'm not a very large girl. These were clearly designed for bean pole legs. I will be attempting to stretch mine without ripping them as I have already washed them and cannot return them... what a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: As described, a fine product, a couple of wishes
customer_reviews.text: Overall great, but a couple of areas I wish were different: the hole for the heel could be bigger, and I wish the top was stretchier. They will stretch to about a 16" thigh, which for me is about mid-thigh. They are probably fine as is for most women but my legs are kinda muscular. Still love them but just a couple of wishes.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tall women
customer_reviews.text: I love these leg warmers. I'm 6 foot tall women. They come right up to my crotch area. They sit perfectly and they don't roll down. I would recommend to any tall women that want the full warmth in the winter time. Buying two more different color pairs after this post!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I use these all winter for extra warmth and they are brilliant! They only come up just above my knees, not my full leg, but totally worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: aryn blase

customer_reviews.title: Perfection.
customer_reviews.text: These are reallllyyy long. And Im thankful for that. Im 5'6 and i have long limbs. These arent really tight on my thighs, but Im more on the fit side (155 lbs). And let me tell you, I have semi-thick thighs. They were somewhat snug, but after wearing them for an hour or two, theyve stretched out a bit. I plan on trying these out with a pair of shorts and a crop top. But we'll see how daring Ill actually end up being with these..
customer_reviews.author: Emma FlenerTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a "fit as expected", but I feel like that doesn't do these justice. I honestly didn't expect these to fit very well at all. If you're reaching into the six foot tall area like I am you know how hard it can be to find stuff like leggings that actually fit well. Usually things like this that I order are either too short or too tight, but these were just as long as promised and fit snuggly on me without cutting off circulation.
customer_reviews.author: JWH

customer_reviews.title: Decent leg warmers for the price but you'll need small thighs
customer_reviews.text: You have to be super skinny if you want to wear these up to your thigh (my lower thigh is 19"). I could only get them above my knee, which still works ok. Stitching around the stirrups get pretty uncomfortable if you're walking on them.
customer_reviews.author: April Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Wow, not sure where to start. These are too tight for the thighs. The fact that I'm not able to return them is even more of a disappointment. The product is damaged there is a hole in the upper part of the stocking.... I will tell everyone I know not to purch5
customer_reviews.author: brandy

customer_reviews.title: Long, Warm and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I have to wear a dress and tights for work and bought these to help stay warm in my cold work environment without drawing too much attention to my legs and they are perfect! I stay warm and they look alright under my uniform. They aren't too tight around my thighs, which is great.
customer_reviews.author: LondontoBerlin

customer_reviews.title: Soft and warm
customer_reviews.text: Soft and warm and one of my favorite things for cold days
customer_reviews.author: Ember

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I was so worried about these fitting as I'm a 6/8 5'10" but I can get these all the way up to my bum. They are slightly tight on the biggest part of my thigh but no way uncomfortable. I can wear them over leggings to add extra warmth or in class until I'm warmed up.
customer_reviews.author: Rainy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy- not long enough, not good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible quality and do not fit. The fabric is rough, not warm or comfy which is what I want in a pair. Additionally they are not returnable which I was not aware of at the time of purchase. The product said they were long enough. I’m 5’11” and they are just long enough to not look extra weird. I’d say the “extra long” description is generous. For what you are paying for these, I’d say turn and go to a costume store instead. Same quality as cheap warmers.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline W.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stretch around thigh part
customer_reviews.text: Can’t get the thing up my thighs! I do have thick thighs ... but I was hoping to be able to keep them warm too 😫
customer_reviews.author: Zamber

customer_reviews.title: Keeper
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a senior citizen to sleep in. Slim fit, extra-long length, soft. The thigh opening is small. Not able to pull it up as high as shown on the model but it comes up to the mid-thigh and stays put. Keeper.
customer_reviews.author: VKF

customer_reviews.title: My legs are pretty thin and I found them to be a tad ...
customer_reviews.text: My legs are pretty thin and I found them to be a tad snug at the top when pulled up to the thigh. Not unbearable and still comfy. Eventually I cut the string at the top which created a few tiny holes, but now they are perfect! I use and wash these all the time and they're still kicking! Never had a problem with them slouching or sliding.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick thighs beware!
customer_reviews.text: As others have stated, these are not for women with generous or muscular thighs. I'm 5'6", with an athletic build and although the length was adequate, I can't get these more than a few inches above my knees. They are cozy and warm, but for me they work more like over the knee socks instead of true thigh high leg warmers. Definitely not enough to keep warm at barre or between classes.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Brown

customer_reviews.title: - Can be itchy - Not especially sturdy in stitching - Individual fibers can be stretched creating ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the only cheaper options for stirrup legwarmers this long, and they do the job for the price but not much more. Pros: - WARM! - Stirrup stitching is secure/solid - Long as advertised Cons: - Can be itchy - Not especially sturdy in stitching - Individual fibers can be stretched creating some "yarn" effects and pilling - Banded at the top to stay up; any athlete/dancer with larger thighs might lose circulation without some "adjustments"
customer_reviews.author: HLVN

customer_reviews.title: Long, comfy and fit thigh thighs
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are great! I only rated them a 4 star because the color does bleed. Be careful when wearing them with light colored items or when you plan to sweat. The color bleed stops after 3 - 4 washes.
customer_reviews.author: ChicCaliHiker

customer_reviews.title: They will give you muffin-top thigh if you don't have the legs of a dancer.
customer_reviews.text: This was wishful thinking, but still... the tops REALLY dig into your upper-thighs. It's terribly unflattering if you have the slightest bit of jiggle. I wish there was an elastic give around the band but unfortunately I will have to wait and wear these after I shave my thighs in half. They are definitely as long as described and the fabric isn't terrible but the yarn was a bit rough- not scratchy, but not very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Sentient

customer_reviews.title: it wouldnt be so bad LOL! I do like them tho
customer_reviews.text: My legs are tiny to begin with, and these things cut unto my leg where there's a slight bludging above and below the top band. Maybe if my legs were all muscle instead of jiggle, it wouldnt be so bad LOL! I do like them tho. There is a hole for the herk of your foot to sit in, it's perfect for high heels. Put these babies over your stiletos, the heel thru that hole, and you have a completely different look.
customer_reviews.author: C Ayers

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!! Long Length!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was absolutely thrilled to get these!! I've searched for extra long leg warmers and these where definitely what I've been looking for!!
customer_reviews.author: Aleasha

customer_reviews.title: Nice Length! Too Tight on Quads Though
customer_reviews.text: These have a very nice, warm feeling to them. However, they are so tight on the quads. These are for dancers and gymnasts right? Well, dancers and gymnasts have thigh muscles and the thigh end part is very tight. Other than that, great warmers and length.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: But I don't think it's a bad thing. I'm a 23-year-old woman whose 5'4
customer_reviews.text: It definitely keeps my legs warm but it's so long that it goes all the way up my legs and when I say "all the way up" I mean ALL THE WAY UP. But I don't think it's a bad thing. I'm a 23-year-old woman whose 5'4. I get cold fairly easily and in the chance that one day it starts shrinking, at least it'll eventually fit me. But because of the material, it won't shrink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite leg warmers
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite leg warmers. I have purchased three pair in various colors. I'm 5'7'' and 135-140lbs with long and slim legs. I don't pull these up full length as they would be a little snug for comfort, but I don't have to bunch them down very much. After wearing them a lot The upper thigh has loosed enough to make them more comfortable without them becoming baggy or losing their overall shape. Comfy, warm, not scratchy.
customer_reviews.author: Llamadu

customer_reviews.title: For small or average thighs only
customer_reviews.text: They're long and warm, but they are WAY too small at the top. I could just barely get them halfway up my thigh, and even then they were too tight to be comfortable. I would NOT recommend them to anyone a size 12 or larger unless you have very slim thighs. I have thick, muscular thighs (I used to cheer back in the day) and these did not work for me at all.
customer_reviews.author: D'Lisa H

customer_reviews.title: For sticks only
customer_reviews.text: Anybody with thighs that are 8-10" in circumference will love these. If you have any muscle in your legs, these will not fit. AND they cannot be returned. If you have 48" long arms, or a large boa constrictor, they may come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: JennTodd

customer_reviews.title: good quality but a little too tight around thigh.
customer_reviews.text: love these! They are thick and not see through even when pulled tight around knee. a little scratchy, and way tight around thigh!! I am 5' 3" and have a slim build at 120 lbs and I had to do some serious yoga just to pull them past my knees ;) with a little stretching ( did fine without ripping ) They were comfy enough and didn't move an inch. had lots of extra length because I'm a shorty but they looked cute scrunched around my boots/ shoes
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: and what makes it worse is there is NO RETURNS offered
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give this no stars. I am size small and these are too tight for me, and what makes it worse is there is NO RETURNS offered. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Return Customer
customer_reviews.text: I'm a return customer. Good product, good price and good seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these leg warmers
customer_reviews.text: I love these leg warmers. I will say that they fit as expected only because I expected my thighs not to fit in ballet dancer type leg warmers. I usually wear these right above my knees and use the rest of the fabric right at my knees since I bought these for my pole fitness class and this is a lot cuter than knee pads. However if I want a REALLY tight fit I can get them all the way up to about where the picture shows.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Too tight of a top
customer_reviews.text: The length and color of these are amazing, however the top that is supposed to go around my thigh is so small it seems to be meant for my wrist. Due to the fact the top is so small my legs circulation is cut off and any extra fat or skin squeezes out.
customer_reviews.author: Irish33

customer_reviews.title: I'm 5'2" and 130 lbs and very fit. All ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2" and 130 lbs and very fit. All I can say is... it was like trying to fit a sock over my knees and thighs. To be honest with you I really wanna take the one star back. On a positive note Amazon refunded my money.
customer_reviews.author: Luvlylashes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for over a month now, and wear them almost nightly, they are very comfortable and I sleep in them a lot. The open toe allows you toes to breath, while the extra long design keeps my legs warm with out adding layers to my crotch. Underwear and a t-shirt good to crash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thick thighs and winter time
customer_reviews.text: Whoever said wear them upside down gets my vote. The bottom of these are made like old fashioned stirrup pants. Fold the stirrup to the side and slide one on upside down if you have thick thighs, otherwise- if you wear them the right way they are too tight to pull up high on your thigh. Now- go one and put the other one on upside down. Neat trick huh?
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Gawel

customer_reviews.title: They don't stay up at all.
customer_reviews.text: They don't stay up at all. Once I start walking they slowly start to fall down. It's a awkward feeling, because I used mine as leg warmers underneath my work pants.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I think these are my third or fourth pair, so what does THAT tell ya?! LA-LA-LOVE the 48-inch length, I can push them down or pull them all the way up, to TOTALLY versatile! And, they get even softer as you use/wash them!! The only thing I'd recommend is wrapping a wide piece of [black] duct tape around the stirrup (under the shoe) so they last even LONGER!! *;D
customer_reviews.author: Survival Gal

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, but tighter fit on big thighs
customer_reviews.text: Bit too tight around the thighs, but not wholly unexpected. Gets about mid thigh.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Lee

customer_reviews.title: ... these to work at a strip club and I love them. They slide down a bit but not ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear these to work at a strip club and I love them. They slide down a bit but not anymore than regular thigh high socks do. They're very soft and give me some more support on my knees when I'm doing floor work
customer_reviews.author: Lacie

customer_reviews.title: For very thin legs
customer_reviews.text: I really like the length of these the only problem was the top was extremely tight I am 170 pounds 5' 8" tall1
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Definitely warm!!!
customer_reviews.text: Being a fairly tall, and slim woman, I rarely have to deal with things being too long. This, however, was significantly longer than my legs. I gave stars though because the material is great quality! It was packaged nicely and shipped quickly! I just bunch it up a little bit ( still just as cute! ) and I'm good to go!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca t

customer_reviews.title: Very tight at the thigh, I use them as extra thick calf-warmers
customer_reviews.text: These are long enough, BUT they do not taper as they go down the leg. They are the same diameter throughout. As a result, they become extremely tight at the thigh (I'm fairly thin). If you are OK with the tightness they could work but otherwise not. I turn them around and use them as turbo-charged leg (calf) warmers which works for me hence the 3 stars, but consider what you want them for and how much tightness you can handle at the thigh.
customer_reviews.author: Molly34857

customer_reviews.title: If you are curvy and a little thick in the thighs as I am.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat tight around the upper thighs, if you are curvy and a little thick in the thighs as I am. But if you read the reviews this is to be expected, Very long, and soft. Long enough to pull my feet inside for warmth when on the couch watching TV and my feet get cold. Looking forward to getting a pair in gray when I can. All in all I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Wild4the1

customer_reviews.title: The too tight at the top reviews weren't lying.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size one in women's jeans, which isn't average (atleast amongst the women I know, who usually run a size 3-5 ((not thay anything is wrong with that at all!))) I'm just used to things that "run small" fitting just right, but the tops of them are pretty small, I can get them about half way up my thighs, when I was hoping to get them all the way up there. Hoping they'll stretch out a bit. I still love them either way!
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: My favorite leg warmers so far
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these . They were long enough and the only downside was that they were made for someone with a leaner thigh but if you cut the cord on the very inside top in a few places they will fit just fine
customer_reviews.author: D.S.

customer_reviews.title: Big booty Judy
customer_reviews.text: Looooove these!!! After a few washes they got a little weird but still totally wearable & make your butt look good. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Zoë

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for cost
customer_reviews.text: Needed a little bigger at the thigh but overall love these
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: They were great after I altered them...
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a leggy 5'8" tall slender blond. I got these for her so she could wear her lingerie but not be cold. The stretchy band on the top of the legging was too tight. I cut the stitching to all allow the elastic to exand more and that worked great. They are nice and long, and look great under a slinky night gown, but I had to alter them. If you are shorter than 5'5" or would not consider your legs thin, then look for a boot sock instead of a yoga, or dance warm up.
customer_reviews.author: amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: 4 foot long
customer_reviews.text: These were WAY long, but I expected that senses I'm only 58". But I wear these all the time and absolutely love them!!!! They stay up when im dancing and they are super cute. No issues. This is my second time ordering. Still love them. I wear them 2-3 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Sam white-fox

customer_reviews.title: thigh area too tight
customer_reviews.text: They're nice but as others have said, the top of the thigh is way too small. I'm not skinny but not chubby either.. about a medium with fairly slim legs. You'd have to be a child for it to not be too tight. Other than that, they are nice.. maybe someone should revise the design??
customer_reviews.author: Sean's mom

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I love leg warmers in general but these are so nice! I have long legs and these make me feel super cute. They’re warm, comfy, and the stretch is perfect! I wear them almost every night
customer_reviews.author: Peachysweet

customer_reviews.title: Love them! Just my constant battle of my upper thigh dancer legs
customer_reviews.text: Love them nice and long and warm with feet stirrups! Unfortunately for me my upper thigh it much more muscular ( bigger) than my lower leg. It always been that way for me !? So I just gently stretched out the upper band to fit me more perfect ! Love them other than these dancer legs of mine!?
customer_reviews.author: SavvySandyShopping

customer_reviews.title: Long leg warmers
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Long! I wear them slochy due to the extra length but they fit over my knee pads and look cute in a causal way. Ppl said the thigh was tight. I found them to fit well on first wear but definitely have thin legs. However, these stretch. I noticed even after one wear.
customer_reviews.author: Alycia Sydnor

customer_reviews.title: They are horribly tight at the top and cuts off the circulation ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely long, but barely goes above my knees! They are horribly tight at the top and cuts off the circulation in my legs. The worst part is that this cannot be returned.
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Keeping Legs Warm
customer_reviews.text: When i hold them in front of me they go from the floor up to my shoulders. . Don't know why they would make them so long. I only keep them because my house is so cold. They do the job.
customer_reviews.author: XOQTOX1960 (Carol)

customer_reviews.title: I really loved though. The quality is good and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Is really long and it is tight on the thighs ^_^ but I have undone the top part and that resolved the issue. I really loved though. The quality is good and it is warm.
customer_reviews.author: Clecia

customer_reviews.title: The top of them were too tight and wouldn't fit ...
customer_reviews.text: The top of them were too tight and wouldn't fit very far up past my knee. I had to cut out the material that was preventing them from fitting properly.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Stein

customer_reviews.title: great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price! I suggest washing by hand or gently with dark colors. Had some balling of the yarn and other colors on the black from washing together in machine! They are super long and I love the option of wearing them below the heel or not and above the knee or not!
customer_reviews.author: nicole Jimmo

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews I was semi expecting these to be small but they fit pretty comfortably on my thighs about mid length. Very cute and super soft after I washed them as well.
customer_reviews.author: thunker

customer_reviews.title: tight around the thigh
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn these while dancing yet but when I tried them on they were extremely tight around the legs. I'm pretty small (I wear a 00) so I was a little surprised that the elastic wasn't more stretchy. I'm hoping they open up as a wear them more. I'm just not sure if someone who is larger than I would find them too uncomfortable. Then again I have just gotten into dancing so maybe that is the norm. Otherwise the quality is good, the length is perfect, and they will definitely come in handy as I continue to take dance classes.
customer_reviews.author: Marquessa Gray

customer_reviews.title: Warm and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Very long! Great for anyone over 5'7". Fits well around the feet and gives that extra "slack" for movement.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: so I wasn't too disappointed when they only went to my knees
customer_reviews.text: I'm thicker, so I don't really ever expect to have things be thigh high, so I wasn't too disappointed when they only went to my knees. They're still cute & Comfortable. Kept my legs warm in the New York ❄️ cold, so that's all that really matters.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: These fit fine and are comfortable everywhere except at the very top ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit fine and are comfortable everywhere except at the very top on the thigh there's like a really tight ring of stitches. If you're good with sewing, you could probably cut it and make it big enough to fit a normal adult thigh but as it comes right out of the box, it isn't going to be comfortable at that one spot at the top, just super tight.
customer_reviews.author: ShadowRavenAMP

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Great value
customer_reviews.text: These look great, being thigh high, and stay up well. I have older pairs that have lasted for years, and they have held up better than more expensive brands. I recoomend hand washing to avoid pilling.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Fontes

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have muscular but not huge or bulky legs and I couldn't even get these past just above my knees. I may end up cutting the tops off to see if they'll be of any use. Otherwise, they're going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Sara McElwain

product_meta.title: Body Wrappers 48" Extra Long Stirrup Leg Warmers - 92
feature_bullets: Full Leg Cover Solution For Warmth And Mobility
Super Soft And Stretches Out To Fit Most Body Types Up To Mid-Thigh Or Full Leg
Perfect For Ballet And Other Dance Classes During The Cold Months
Available In One-Size-Fits-Most *Sizes Are A Guide, Not A Guarantee
